definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: And there is still long way to go before the issue is ultimately resolved peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 最终和平解决朝核问题还有很长的一段路要走。

sentences.english: North Korean Nuclear issue is one of the world's biggest international issues since 1995.
sentences.chinese: 1995年以来，朝核问题是全世界关注的国际问题。

sentences.english: Japan, the US and the ROK will hold a meeting to talk about the issue during the APEC Meeting.
sentences.chinese: 在峰会期间，日美韩将举行会议讨论朝核问题。

sentences.english: Yang also took questions form the journalists on China-Japan relations and the Korean Peninsula nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪还就中日关系和朝核问题回答了记者提问。

sentences.english: This is the only viable solution to the Korean nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 这是解决朝核问题的唯一现实出路。

sentences.english: Hu and Putin also exchanged views and reached consensus on the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛和普京还就朝核问题交换了意见并达成共识。

sentences.english: What message did China convey to the DPRK side on the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula?
sentences.chinese: 中方在会谈中就朝核问题向朝方传达了什么信息？

sentences.english: I know it will take time to [achieve] a complete solution to the Korean nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 我知道要完全解决朝核问题需要时间。

sentences.english: They will exchange views on the Korean nuclear issue and other issues of common interest.
sentences.chinese: 双方将就朝核问题和其他共同关心的问题交换意见。

sentences.english: Therefore, both sides stress the necessity of continuing the six-party talks on the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 因此，强调继续朝核问题六方会谈的必要性。

sentences.english: It is expected that the six-party talks on the Korean Nuclear Issue will be carried on.
sentences.chinese: 朝核问题六方会谈有望继续进行下去。

sentences.english: The six party talks on North Korea's nuclear issue have been held for five times.
sentences.chinese: 朝核问题六方会谈已连续召开五轮。

sentences.english: The two Ministers applaud the progress of the Korean Peninsula nuclear issue in recent days.
sentences.chinese: 两国外长都积极评价近期朝核问题取得的积极进展。

sentences.english: The following, take "the Korean nuclear issue" for example!
sentences.chinese: 以下，就拿“朝核问题”作例子吧。

sentences.english: China is ready to strengthen consultations and cooperation with all parties concerned on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 中方愿就朝核问题同有关各方加强磋商和合作。

definition: summit talks/discussion between heads of state
